articles.title: Clarke’s luck turns around after rejection
articles.description: Under-siege former Aussie cricket captain Michael Clarke’s luck may be starting to turn around after he revealed he was in talks for a new commentary gig.
articles.content:
Under-siege former Aussie cricket captain Michael Clarke’s luck may be starting to turn around after he revealed he was in talks for a new commentary gig.

articles.author: Paul Kennedy
articles.title: Meet the man who organised the historic catch up between Sir Donald Bradman and Sachin Tendulkar
articles.description: It was arguably cricket's most famous afternoon tea, and came from one man who simply dared to make a few phone calls.
articles.content:
It was arguably cricket's most famous afternoon tea.
The footage of Sachin Tendulkar and Shane Warne visiting Sir Donald Bradman's home went around the world.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
